Millers River at South Royalston, MA (old BHD tailwater gage). On 1 Nov USGS removed Dead DA unit and replaced with Sutron Satlink. They did not know how to hook up the water temp sensor, so temporarily stopped tx'ng it. For now decoded changed for what is currently transmitting until water temp sensor back.
